channel.title: Winterfell [614]
channel.description:
[FONT=Trebuchet MS][center] [B]Insert banner[/B]
[B][SIZE=4]Winterfell[/SIZE][/B] is a hyperion based server. The original protocol has been converted to suit the 614 revision. The stable base designed by Graham can ensure quality performance & output. It will based around the 2010 going into the 2011 era. Expectations are high and work input is key.
[spoiler="Management"] Once I have converted everything to the 614 revision and done the basics such as player-vs-player combat and so, I will release a public PvP worlds beta meanwhile I program the economy side. The reason I will release a PvP worlds beta is because it is a great way to find many combat-sided bugs, and also allows me to listen to players and see what they will want to see in the economy server. Players can give suggestions and I will do my best to listen to all views from players. I am thinking to have 2 worlds (one of which being a PvP worlds) however this will be decided later on.
[spoiler="Future of Winterfell"] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2FN_DiB46pQ[/youtube] [/spoiler] [/spoiler]
[LEFT] [B][SIZE=3][FONT=Garamond]Developers[/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
[ul]Magnito [COLOR=red]I may require some more developers, I will let everyone know[/COLOR][/ul]
[B][COLOR=orange]Overview[/COLOR][/B]
[ul][*]Build : 614 [*]Base : [B]Hyperion[/B] by Graham [*]Type : Strong economy[/ul]
[ul][*][COLOR=yellow]Cache[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Loading 614 cache[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=yellow]Cache definitions[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=yellow]Item definitions[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]NPC definitions[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=yellow]Object definitions[/COLOR] [/list] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Networking[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=limegreen]JS5 request & Handshake[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Encoding & Decoding[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=yellow]Lobby[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=limegreen]World lists[/COLOR] [/list] [*][COLOR=imegreen]Login[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=red]Account registration[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Recover password link[/COLOR] [/list] [/list]
[/list] [*][B][COLOR=#FFA500]Outgoing Packets[/COLOR][/B] [list] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Mag region[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Send interface[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Send windows pane[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Send skills[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Send config[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Send button config[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Send access mask[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Send string[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Player rendering[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Npc rendering[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Send Music[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Send Sound[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Send interface animation[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Send npc on interface[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Send player on interface[/COLOR] [/list]
[*][COLOR=yellow]Incoming packets[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=red]Walking[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Object options[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Action buttons[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]NPC Options[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Player options[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Item pickup[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Item Examine[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Object Examine[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Npc Examine[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Talking[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=limegreen]Commands[/COLOR] [/list] [/list][/ul]

[ul][*][COLOR=red]Player vs player combat[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Player vs npc combat[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Special attacks[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Magic spells, modern, lunar, ancient[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]All prayers ( I guess this could be under the 'combat' section )[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Quick prayers[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Player vs player formulaes[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Player vs npc formulaes[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Npc weaknesses[/COLOR][/ul]
[B][COLOR=red]Complete bosses/npcs[/COLOR][/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=red]Complete npcs/bosses will be put here.[/COLOR][/ul]
[B][COLOR=red]Minigames[/COLOR][/B]
[ul][*][COLOR=red]Pest control[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Castle wars[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Duel arena[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Stealing creation[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Bounty hunter[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Earning potential[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Clan wars ( safe portal, red portal, purple portal )[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Barbarian assault[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Fist of guthix[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Barbarian outpost[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Warriors guild[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=red]Agility courses[/COLOR][/ul] [/LEFT]

The stable base designed by Graham can ensure quality performance & output. It will based around the 2010 going into the 2011 era. Expectations are high and work input is key.

[spoiler=“Management”]
Once I have converted everything to the 614 revision and done the basics such as player-vs-player combat and so, I will release a public PvP worlds beta meanwhile I program the economy side. The reason I will release a PvP worlds beta is because it is a great way to find many combat-sided bugs, and also allows me to listen to players and see what they will want to see in the economy server. Players can give suggestions and I will do my best to listen to all views from players. I am thinking to have 2 worlds (one of which being a PvP worlds) however this will be decided later on.
